KAAZING WebSocket Intercloud Connect

Supported Services

LDAP
Active Directory
Oracle SQL*Net
SQL Server
DB2
Postgres
POP3
SMTP
SNMP
XMPP
MQTT
AMQP


Supported Services


Service/Protocol Description Installation style Cost
LDAP Lightweight Directory Access Protocol; designed to access directory services remotely. Fully automated FREE
Active Directory Directory service for Windows, built by Microsoft. Fully automated FREE
Oracle SQL*Net Networking protocol to access an Oracle database. Installation style Cost
SQL Server Database server, provided by Microsoft. Installation style Cost
DB2 IBM's relational database server. Installation style Cost
PostgresSQL Open source relational database software. Installation style Cost
POP3 Post Office Protocol, used to access remote email server. Installation style Cost
SMTP Simple Mail Transfer Protocol, used for email transmission. Installation style Cost
SNMP Simple Network Management Protocol; a protocol designed to manage devices remotely. Installation style Cost
XMPP eXtensible Messasging and Presence Protocol; designed for instant messaging and presence applications. Installation style Cost
MQTT MQ (Message Queuing) Telemetry Transport; a publish-subscribe protocol designed for IoT usecases. Installation style Cost
AMQP Advanced Message Queuing Protocol; an open publish-subscribe protocol. Installation style Cost
